channel.title: AutoSpawn Error
channel.description:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 710 2750" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1279) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27) Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 [/code]
Lol oddly, I only can't solve stupid errors and can solve hard ones. XD I was adding 2 new NPC's. Help would be appreciated..

item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

[quote=“Nets8, post:4, topic:115570”]I added spawn = 1710 2750 3411 0 2750 3411 2750 3411 1 H.A.M. Guard spawn = 1710 2754 3411 0 2754 3411 2754 3411 1 H.A.M. Guard[/quote]

spawn = 1710    2750

You used space not tab -_-
